data.name: WIC Heyn Expedition, Capture of Silver Fleet
data.desc: WIC send Pieter Pieterszoon Heyn against Sp, who thereafter captures the Sp Silver Fleet fm Vera Cruz [Mexico]
data.locn: Texel, St. Vincent, Isle of Pines [Cuba], Cape San Antonio, Grenada, St. Kitts, Tobago, Florida Straits, Havana, Isle of Wight
data.agents_sp: Gen Juan de Benavides Baz√°n, Adm Juan de Leoz 2 MW 19 t 20 Ships
data.agents_nsp0: Pieter Pieterszoon Heyn, Hendrick Corneliszoon Loncq, Joost van Trappen alias Banckert 31 Ships 2300 sailors 1000 soldiers
data.prim_n: Naber W [missg] / Laet [missg] = Laet/Naber 2 56-[missg] / Wassenaer 15 54 / Wassenaer 16 97-[missg] / Staten 1.01.02, [missg] [Resolutions of 29 Feb, 27, 28, 31 Mar 1628] / Duro 4 98 / Aitzema 1 720 / Kon Bib PK 3858 / WIC 1.05.01.01, 17 [8 Dec 1628]
data.note: Capture of Silver Fleet on 8 Sep 1628 /v Goslinga 186
